page.title: 08Types of Houses in Knebworth
page.content: We surveyed the houses of the children of Knebworth school and received 157 replies. We asked the question "What sort of house do you live in ?" Here are the results. Three of the replies came from outside Knebworth so they have been discounted. We found that the following lived in each category: Detached {63 { }Semi-detached {67 { }Terraced {11 { }Bungalow {8 { }Maisonette {4 Flat {1 { } ___ Total { 154 We found that most of the families that replied lived in detached and semi_detached houses. There are quite a few people who live in bungalows but they do not have children who are the right age to go to primary school.
